value:
Whew! Enough training for today.
Need to stay in top shape to keep
everyone I hold dear totally safe.

My retainers, Azama and Setsuna,
might not seem like they're all that on
task. But I can totally count on them!

I appreciate how hard you work here,
but pace yourself. People would be
very sad if you got hurt somehow.

You can depend on me completely.
There's something about you. For
some reason, I feel like you're family!

I was just tending to my pegasus.
Their wings are so downy in a few
places. Want to feel it for yourself?

You're $Nu, right?$k$pWhew, I found you! I bring greetings
from $Nf.
Nothing will scare me now.
Well done! Now to try even harder!

That is not good enough. I have
to do better!

Well? Do I seem stronger than
I was before?

I'm Princess Hinoka of Hoshido. I have
a reputation as a warrior princess. So,
happy to hit the battlefield for you!

Hey, you! I just finished grooming
my pegasus and was wondering if
you'd like to take a ride with us.$k$pI've been wanting something to
do to bring us closer together,
and this is perfect!$k$pWe can talk while we admire the
view, soaring through the sky—
you'll love it!$k$pHm? We're already close? That's
really sweet...and I'm a little
embarrassed now.$k$pWell, I still think a joyride
through the skies is in order—
you coming?
せいっ！
やああっ！
うわっ！
I was careless...
I won't lose!
Clear the way!
Here to help!
I can do this!
Too strong!
Heh...
I want to get stronger. No, I have to get stronger!
I take very good care of my pegasus. I should be doing it now!
Just shout anytime you need help. I'll come running.
You have a divine weapon? Neat. My brothers do too!
I sometimes wonder if I should be more graceful and gentle. You know, a princess.
I wonder where Azama and Setsuna are? You never know with those two!
You can't fight in battle, so I'm happy to help you. More than happy!
Yes?
Got it.
Let's go!
